com.mygdx.game

Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.Enemy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Demon, Spitter, Swarmer

    public class Enemy
extends java.lang.Object
    Enemy class acts as the parent class for all Enemy children.
    Author:
    Sean Aubrey, Gabriel Fountain, Brandon Conn
